generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved street with visible lane markings and traffic arrows, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: There is a pedestrian walkway on the right side of the street, separated from the road by poles and curbs, which qualifies as a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple multi-story structures line both sides of the street, including residential and commercial buildings.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible along the sidewalk on the right side of the street.
- traffic sign: A small traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the left side of the street and one car is visible further down the road.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows an overcast sky.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the street.
- truck: A white truck is visible parked on the left side of the street, near the center of the image.
